title: Fix form submission error

requirements.text: Investigate and fix the form submission failure in PatientFormPage that causes the 'Failed to submit form. Please try again.' error message to appear when users submit the patient intake form

quotes: saat sumbit data ada keterangan Failed to submit form. Please try again.

acceptanceCriteria: Patient form submits successfully without error messages
Form data is properly saved to backend
User is redirected to success page after successful submission
Error handling provides specific feedback if submission fails

requirements.text: Add proper error logging and validation feedback to identify the root cause of submission failures, including network errors, backend validation issues, or data format problems
acceptanceCriteria: Console logs show detailed error information when submission fails
User receives specific error messages indicating what went wrong
Form validation errors are displayed inline on relevant fields

constraints: Maintain existing data structure for PatientSubmission with structured personalInfo fields
Preserve backward compatibility with existing submissions
Do not modify Internet Identity authentication flow
nonGoals: Redesigning the form UI or layout
